entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 2026, 09:00 - 09:02 UTC

Sep 17, 13:21 UTC

Start time : 02/03/2026 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/03/2026 09:02 UTC
Maintenance : Scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes will be performed.

Service improvement : The deprecated API routes are replaced by a new API route that provide the same level of features:

entry.title: [EU][Control panel & API] - Customer Contact via emails incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 1, 16:11 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Control panel & API offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 01/09/2025 09:20 UTC
End time : 01/09/2025 16:10 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by the ongoing incident : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/0mtxmtppc0dp

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Sep 1, 11:48 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A fix has been implemented, and emails are being sent gradually since 11:45 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 1, 11:08 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Control panel & API offer on the specific EU region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 01/09/2025 09:20 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : European Customer Contact via emails is degraded.
Customers Impact : Emails sent by OVHcloud to customers (customer services emails) are currently not being sent (the throughput is very low, so emails are being sent late).
Customers may receive communications from OVHcloud with a significant delay.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by the ongoing incident: https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/0mtxmtppc0dp
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
